titlestmt.titleproper: Ford Foundation records, Audiovisual and Multimedia materials
A Guide to the Ford Foundation records, Audiovisual and Multimedia materials FA1670

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2020-10-09 03:05:44 -0400.

did.unittitle: Ford Foundation records, Audiovisual and Multimedia materials

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research with select materials restricted as noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC. Researchers interested in accessing digital media (floppy disks, CDs, DVDs, etc.) in this collection must use an access surrogate. The original items may not be accessed because of preservation concerns. To request an access surrogate be made, or if you are unsure if there is an access surrogate, please contact an archivist.

When requesting to view audiovisual material, please refer to the Title and the AV Number (example: AV 1916). Researchers are asked to check the "Restrictions" note for each Title. If a Title does not currently have an access copy, please contact a RAC archivist for further instruction.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at https://rockarch.org/collections/access-and-request-materials/#citations

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Multiple collections of audiovisual and multimedia materials, several of which are designated by accession. Accessions denote when the material was transferred to and processsed by RAC and do not imply an original order of the records. Each collection may be comprised of multiple series and/or accessions. Additional finding aids are created as records are processed and open for research.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Comprised of film reels, video tapes, audio reels and cassettes and multimedia items.
